a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}{d}PA-bal-liṭ-an-ni lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia DI-mu a-na KUR ša LUGAL be-li₂-ia ina UGU x x x ša x+x x x x x x+x ina {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} x x x x x {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ x x x x x e-tar-ba x x x x x kal-la-ma-ri x x x x x x i-tal-ka x x x x x-du-um-ma x x x x x x-ub x x x x x x-ak x x x x x x-ba-ab x x x x x x x-MEŠ o
